dcterms:description: A dataset containing 24 hours of real weather histories collected over 31 days in July 2017 in West Lafayette, Indiana, USA, used to approximate ambient weather conditions for building climate control simulations.
dcterms:title: 24 hours real weather histories

dcterms:creator: S. Lee
I. Bilionis
P. Karava
A. Tzempelikos
dcterms:description: A dataset used for probabilistic classification and inference of occupant thermal preferences in office buildings, providing insights into how occupants respond to different thermal environments.
dcterms:title: Bayesian modelling approach for occupant thermal preferences

dcterms:creator: S. Lee
P. Karava
A. Tzempelikos
I. Bilionis
dcterms:description: A dataset that infers thermal preference profiles for personalized thermal environments based on actual building occupants, enhancing the understanding of individual comfort needs.
dcterms:title: Inference of thermal preference profiles
